title: Unadopted Emu
content:
Finally got some photos developed. These were taken in a small Northern English town.

This first one puzzles me, how can an old street be unadopted? The street sign was on a wall of a pretty old building.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727030557im_/http:/typophile.com/files/unadopted_l_4345.jpg)

This old shop sign was on a wall of a side street building. Got some funny looks when I took the photo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727030557im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Emu_1_5476.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727030557im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Emu_2_5661.jpg)

This one is from Milan: Fonts galore in Corso Buenos Aires

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120727030557im_/http:/typophile.com/files/signs_Milan_5104.jpg)
author: mili

comments.content: the unadopted emu named ben. ben the emu. won't you give ben a home ?
